name: Candy Blast: Sweet Splash
description:
This fun and delicious match 3 puzzle game is sure to become your favorite!

Have fun with dynamic obstacles and well designed puzzles in hundreds of levels! Immerse yourself in this deceptively simple, stress-free, sugar sweet match 3 puzzle game.

Candy Blast is a simple snack of a game, meant for players who just want to play and have fun, without being distracted by bells and whistles. Unlike other match 3 games, this game is all about YOU.

What you'll love about Candy Blast:

NO Life, Stamina, or Energy!
Play puzzles for however long you want without waiting to recharge!

NO internet connection required!
Play whenever, wherever; even without wifi or data!

NO large storage space needed!
Play without worrying about your games eating up all your space!

NO impossible levels designed to make players fail!
Play for fun, with real, honest challenge puzzles!

Join hundreds of thousands of other players!

"Amazing, awesome and addicting. This is a game for all ages!"
"Love the game, simple puzzles but very addictive!"
"Lots of fun. Unique and refreshingly different."

Get your sugar rush on! Join in the fun and download Candy Blast: Sugar Splash today!

*Please note that Candy Blast: Sugar Splash saves your progress on your device, and data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.*
